Wolfblade::

She wrapped her arms around his neck as he pulled her to her feet. 
She was still sobbing,"I don't care the cost, I just want you to be
happy. I don't care anymore if it me or someone else."  She burried
her faceplates into his chest. "I love you Malice, I love you."
With tear stained cheeks, she leaned up and kissed him. 
Standing in the apple groves, on a warm day, the birds were sings, the
flowers blooming, and all she even notices, was her lips touching his,
and her body close to his.  


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> He could not believe what he was hearing.  He simply couldn't.  he
reached out and held her close to him.
>  
> "No Wolfblade!  Don't leave me!  It was wrong of me to think this
would work out, I was a fool.  Don't go, I could not live without you."
>  
> He struggled to his feet, in actual physical pain.  He pulled her up
with him, pain and sorrow etched into his faceplates. 
>  
> "I will handle this, please do not leave me.  It's my turn to make a
hard decision.  Stay with me, and when this is over, I'll take you to
someplace we can live together happily."
>
